title: Get on Out of Here, Philip Hall
description: What do you do when you're not in first place anymore?Beth Lambert's got everything going for her -- she's the best student in her grade, president of the Pretty Pennies Girls' Club, and winner of a major 4-H prize. She's sure all of her dreams will come true, and nothing will go wrong. But that was before Philip Hall became Number One again. Beth's got a lot to learn -- but she'll do it in style!
author: Bette Greene
